notes: loanword from French; often used for restroom and for grooming; often invariable plural
common indefinite for a single restroom
example_sentence_english: I am looking for a restroom.

notes: definite plural article with invariable noun
example_sentence_english: The restrooms are at the back.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono delle toilette al primo piano.
example_sentence_english: There are some restrooms on the first floor.

example_sentence_english: The location of the restrooms is indicated.
